---
id: modify-group-specification-limits
title: "Modify group specification limits"
description: "By calling this API, you can modify the following specification limits of a group:"
api: 
info_path: core_products/zim/en/docs_zim_server/Group/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Modify group specification limits</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


By calling this API, you can modify the following specification limits of a group:

- Join mode;
- Invite mode;
- Be invited mode;
- Group member count limit (not exceeding the package limit, for details please refer to [Pricing - Version Differences](/zim-android/introduction/pricing#plan-differences)).

After successful modification, group members can receive notifications of group specification limit modifications through the following ZIM SDK callback interfaces:

| iOS-25% | Android-25% | macOS-25% | Windows-25% |
|-----|---------|--------|---------|
| [groupVerifyInfoUpdated](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~objective-c_ios~protocol~ZIMEventHandler#zim-group-verify-info-updated-operated-info-group-id) | [onGroupVerifyInfoUpdated](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~java_android~class~ZIMEventHandler#on-group-verify-info-updated) | [groupVerifyInfoUpdated](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~objective-c_macos~protocol~ZIMEventHandler#zim-group-verify-info-updated-operated-info-group-id) | [onGroupVerifyInfoUpdated](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~cpp_windows~class~ZIMEventHandler#on-group-verify-info-updated) |

| Web-25% | Mini Program-25% | Flutter-25% | React Native-25% |
|-----|---------|---------|---------|
| [groupVerifyInfoUpdated](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~javascript_web~interface~ZIMEventHandler#group-verify-info-updated) | [groupVerifyInfoUpdated](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~javascript_wxxcx~interface~ZIMEventHandler#group-verify-info-updated) | [onGroupVerifyInfoUpdated](https://pub.dev/documentation/zego_zim/latest/zego_zim/ZIMEventHandler/onGroupVerifyInfoUpdated.html) |[groupVerifyInfoUpdated](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~javascript_react-native~interface~ZIMEventHandler#group-verify-info-updated) |

| Unity3D-25% | uni-app \| uni-app x-25% | HarmonyOS-25% |
|---------|--------------|-----------|
| [OnGroupVerifyInfoUpdated](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~cs_unity3d~class~ZIMEventHandler#on-group-verify-info-updated) |[groupVerifyInfoUpdated](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~javascript_uni-app~interface~ZIMEventHandler#group-verify-info-updated) |[groupVerifyInfoUpdated](https://www.zegocloud.com/docs/article/api?doc=zim_API~javascript_harmony~interface~ZIMEventHandler#group-verify-info-updated) |

<Note title="Note">
The parameters FromUserID and GroupId only support numbers, English characters, and `'!','#','$','%','&','(',')','+','\'',':',';','<','=','.','>','?',
'@','[',']','^','_','{','}','|','~'`.

If you do not need to modify `JoinMode`, `InviteMode`, or `BeInvitedMode`, please do not include these parameters in the request URL. If the parameter is included but not assigned a value, the parameter value may be modified to 0.
</Note>
<Note title="QPS Limit"> 20 times/s</Note>

## Request

modification operator (who has logged in to the ZIM service by calling the login method on the client, or has completed registration by calling the [server-side className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"JoinMode","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"number","enum":[0,1,2]},"description":"Join mode:\n- 0: (Default) No verification required, anyone can join the group directly.\n- 1: Users need to initiate a join request, and can only join the group after approval by the group owner or group administrator.\n- 2: External users can only join the group through invitation by group members.\n"}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"InviteMode","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"number","enum":[0,1]},"description":"Invite mode:\n- 0: (Default) All group members can invite external users to join the group.\n- 1: Only the group owner or group administrator can initiate invitations.\n"}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"BeInvitedMode","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"number","enum":[0,1]},"description":"Be invited mode:\n- 0: (Default) External users can be directly invited to join the group without their consent.\n- 1: After inviting someone to join the group, their consent is required.\n"}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"MemberCountLimit","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"number"},"description":"Group member count limit, default value is 0."}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details>
